get order flowers now for helga's visitation rosary. jun 23. 11:00 am french funerals - cremations (lomas)10500 lomas blvd nealbuquerque, nm, us, 87112. get order flowers now for helga's rosary cemetery details. sunset memorial park924 menaul blvd nealbuquerque, nm, us, 87107. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of helga zetocha send comfort to the zetocha family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! mt marilyn thomsen. jun 22 at 2:21 pm i remember on one of your first trips to the states and an electric door opening made you jump.....;. we both have talked about that for so many years. i have enjoyed our many telephone calls even last week when you were in rehab. i know you ate the last cherries on your tree and that your garden was doing well. i will miss you dear one, but i know you are looking down at us, hearing us, and sending us love. comment share comment share facebook twitter
